article_text: On a cold and windy day before Thanksgiving, an officer from the Miami police K-9 unit was hiding in a garbage can around the unit’s headquarters in Flagami. He wouldn’t stay there long. A police dog was out to get him.

article_metadata.title: In training: Dog groomed for police work in Miami | Miami Herald

article_summary:
On a cold and windy day before Thanksgiving, an officer from the Miami police K-9 unit was hiding in a garbage can around the unit’s headquarters in Flagami.
He wouldn’t stay there long.
A police dog was out to get him.
